Package marvel.model

Class ModelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • marvel.model.ModelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelFacade
    public class ModelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelFacade
    Provides methods for clients to make mutable and accessor calls to APIs. Acts as an interface for the client to interact with the complex model subsystem.
    See Also:
    ModelFacade, InputModel, OutputModel

        Parameters:

        output - A OutputModel object that can be online or offline
        handler - A ConfigHandler object used for getting API keys

        Returns:

      • getCharacterInfo

        public void getCharacterInfo​(java.lang.String name)
        Performs operations needed to retrieve information on character matching given name

        Ask input sub model to conduct search for character information with provided name.

        Upon successful search, update searched list with names of character, adding name to list in order of search when list is not full and replacing name in list at matching index chosen by user when list is full

        After input model completed request, notify observers request complete

        After searched list is updated, notify observers about the update

        Specified by:
        getCharacterInfo in interface ModelFacade
        Parameters:
        name - String of name of character to search API with.

      • getCurrentCharacter

        public CharacterInfo getCurrentCharacter()
        Retrieves current CharacterInfo in model
        Specified by:
        getCurrentCharacter in interface ModelFacade
        Returns:
        CharacterInfo - CharacterInfo object built from last successful search

      • getImagePathByInfo

        public java.lang.String getImagePathByInfo​(CharacterInfo info)
        Retrieves full URL path to thumbnail given a CharacterInfo object
        Specified by:
        getImagePathByInfo in interface ModelFacade
        Parameters:
        info - CharacterInfo object that contains data
        Returns:
        String - Full URL path for thumbnail image if info is not null, otherwise return null

      • sendReport

        public void sendReport​(CharacterInfo info)
        Ask output sub model to send a report based on provided CharacterInfo's data.

        Calls notifyObserverGetInfoComplete() to notify all observers when operation is done.

        Specified by:
        sendReport in interface ModelFacade
        Parameters:
        info - - CharacterInfo object that contains data to generate report with

      • isInfoInCache

        public boolean isInfoInCache​(java.lang.String name)
        Ask input sub model to search database if record with key matching given name
        Specified by:
        isInfoInCache in interface ModelFacade
        Parameters:
        name - String to search database for matching record
        Returns:
        boolean - return true if record found, otherwise false

      • loadInfoFromCache

        public void loadInfoFromCache​(java.lang.String name)
        Performs operations needed to retrieve information on character matching given name from the cache database

        Ask input model to search for record with name as key from cache

        If found and CharacterInfo created from record, set current character reference to it

        Upon successful retrieval, update searched list with name of character, adding name to list in order of search when list is not full and replacing name in list at matching index chosen by user when list is full

        After input model completed request, notify observers request complete

        After searched list is updated, notify observers about the update

        Specified by:
        loadInfoFromCache in interface ModelFacade
        Parameters:
        name - String to search database for matching record

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver​(ModelObserver obs)
        Adds an observer to list of ModelObserver, to be notified upon API requests completed
        Specified by:
        addObserver in interface ModelFacade
        Parameters:
        obs - - ModelObserver object to be added

      • setIndexSelected

        public void setIndexSelected​(int index)
        Sets the integer selected as index in list of searched characters
        Specified by:
        setIndexSelected in interface ModelFacade
        Parameters:
        index - integer selected by user to be used for swapping out names in searched list, must be in range 0-2
